projects.name: Fib-Functor
projects.summary: The divisibility relation on the natural numbers forms an example of a category, an abstract mathematical structure. The fibonacci sequence on this category is an example of a functor, a map preserving the structure of a category. This project is on the formalization of this fact, as well as related properties of the fibonacci functor, in Lean4, an interactive theorem prover.
